# Drow Equipment
## Overview
***[[Drow]] have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Drow|drow]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Drow Quill]]
- [[Weapon Webbing]]
- [[Web Shackles]]
